ds_id: Apple shares hit new all-time intraday and closing highs@MacDailyNews@2023-06-15 13:54:34.492908@Apple
data_content: Apple's shares rose 1.12% to $186.01, a new all-time closing high, in Monday's Nasdaq trading, with a trading volume of 62,587,162 shares. The company's PE Ratio stands at 31.53, and its market value is $2.936 trillion, making it the world's most valuable company. Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, and NVIDIA are its top U.S. publicly-traded competitors, based on market value.
